item.title: #AstriCon 2011: Building a Distributed Call Centre
item.description: The presentation and configuration files from my presentation at AstriCon 2011 today is available at: http://leifmadsen.com/sites/default/files/AstriCon 2011 - Building a distributed call centre.zip
